GitSubmodulesSummaryOptionsDialog.getData

getData()

Public method to get the entered data.

Return:
tuple containing a list of selected submodules, a flag indicating to show summary for the superproject index, a flag indicating to show summary for the submodules index, an optional commit ID and a value for the number of entries to be shown
Return Type:
tuple of (list of str, bool, bool, str, int)
